channel.title: MW2 Wtf?
channel.description:
Hey, I was playing mw2 with my friend today on free for all, and i wasn't doing great, but alright.....
But.. the game ended and WTF i went from level 30 to level 70! I don't want to be level 70! with a play time of around 15 hours people are going to think i hacked it!!
How the hell did i get level 70 in one game? is this an error? wtf happened ?
Thanks

item.title: MW2 Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

HALO COMBAT EVOLVED <33333

Read full topic

item.title: MW2 Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:18, topic:386147”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=481902.msg3529500#msg3529500 date=1300054335]

You’d think people would go back to CoD4 rather than this game.

I tried. Almost every game is a modded lobby. It sucks.

Are you on ps3? If so, thats true. On xbox, there all fine.

Yea ps3

Thats cause Sony has nearly no decent security. The damn kernal/user mode keys were ripped from the ps3. Not long after it was found out that one of those keys (ikr what one) was also the user mode key on the PSP. Took 1 week (or so) from then to be able to sign psp homebrew for user-mode. Not sure how long for PS3 but its prolly been completed by now.

Sum Up - Sony cant secure their stuff for shit.
[/quote]

Atleast ps3 doesn’t have a bunch of winey 12 yr olds that explode whenever they die on COD.[/quote]
I would take security over not liking kids. If u hate kids so much though, dont buy games they flip on their parents for and ul be alright. I play with a party anyways, so no need for getting pissed bout bitchers.

Read full topic

I’m just sayin, it’s annoying. I like to talk to people.
